== Summary ==
* Very active member of the Documentation Team, particularly Internet, Switching and Programming.
* Ubuntu Desktop Training, assisting with writers and contributing myself.
* Active in Unanswered Posts Team on the forums.
* Started a project to integrate Open University and Ubuntu.

== Testimonials ==

Dougie is a long-term contributor to the Ubuntu documentation project and (as is apparent from the description above) is one of the most active contributors both of documentation and discussion on the mailing list. He is well worthy of Ubuntu membership -- -- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:mdke]]</nowiki>
